member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.ContextNavigation.GotoDeclarationVsDelegator
member.summary: Allows to perform common VS goto definition (F12).

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Core.ExternalSourcesActivation.Active
member.summary: Turn on/off entire External Sources subsystem. Currenly used to delay External Sources loading in Visual Studio.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Core.IDecompilationCache.CanBeCachedFile(System.String,JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath)
member.summary: Checks whether file is under cache directory and on appropriate level. Doesn't impose any guarantees about GetCacheItem result

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Core.DecompilationCacheItem.Moniker
member.summary: Null for assembly-level decompilation. i.e. assembly attributes

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Core.IExternalSourcesService.NavigateToSources(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.ICompiledElement,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Core.IExternalSourcesProvider})
member.summary: Tries to get source(s) for from
member.returns: source file(s) related to specified compiled element, null if user cancelled action

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Utils.DeclaredElementBinder.BindDeclarations(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Tree.IFile,JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.IPsiModule,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Bind declarations in to corresponding declared elements in psiModule. WARNING: all references of psiModule must be loaded beforehand because binding process uses xmldocids which requires all types to be resolved correctly.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Core.IExternalSourcesProvider.NavigateToSources(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.ICompiledElement,JetBrains.Application.Progress.ITaskExecutor)
member.summary: Tries to get source(s) for specified compiled element
member.returns: source file(s) related to specified compiled element, empty array if none (i.e. not applicable to this provider), null if the navigation was handled by provider

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.ExternalSources.Pdb.Cache.PdbCacheManagerImpl.ScanAssemblyFile(JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath)
